How to add new data: Add the monthly export files from AtWork in "AtWork Imports" and all charts here automatically get updated.

lodash(Data)
  .map(entry => ({
    week: Global.libs.datefns.format(entry.start, "'W'I yyyy"),
    ...entry,
  }))
  .groupBy('week')
  .mapValues(entries => lodash.sumBy(entries, 'workHours'))
  .value()

const {
  ResponsiveContainer,
  BarChart,
  Bar,
  XAxis,
  YAxis,
  Tooltip,
} = Global.libs.recharts;

const data = Object.entries(weeks).map(Global.utils.labeler('week', 'hours'));

<ResponsiveContainer height={300}>
  <BarChart data={data}>
    <Tooltip formatter={Global.utils.formatDuration} />
    <Bar type="monotone" dataKey="hours" fill="#9DD9D2" />
    <XAxis dataKey="week" />
    <YAxis tickFormatter={Global.utils.formatDuration} width={100} />
  </BarChart>
</ResponsiveContainer>

lodash($`Data`)
  .map(entry => ({
    month: Global.libs.datefns.format(entry.start, 'LLL yyyy'),
    ...entry,
  }))
  .groupBy('month')
  .mapValues(entries => lodash.sumBy(entries, 'workHours'))
  .value()

const {
  ResponsiveContainer,
  BarChart,
  Bar,
  XAxis,
  YAxis,
  Tooltip,
} = Global.libs.recharts;

const data = Object.entries(months).map(Global.utils.labeler('month', 'hours'));

<ResponsiveContainer height={300}>
  <BarChart data={data}>
    <Tooltip formatter={Global.utils.formatDuration} />
    <Bar type="monotone" dataKey="hours" fill="#9DD9D2" />
    <XAxis dataKey="month" />
    <YAxis tickFormatter={Global.utils.formatDuration} width={100} />
  </BarChart>
</ResponsiveContainer>

text: Table of Line Items for Hours Worked

input: ## Table of Line Items for Hours Worked

function Table({ data, locale, currency, hourlyWage, taxRate }) { const fmt = formatters({ locale, currency }) const prices = data.map(({ workHours }) => workHours * hourlyWage) const sum = lodash.sum(prices) const taxes = Global.utils.roundOn(sum * taxRate, 0.01) const total = Global.utils.roundOn(sum + taxes, 0.01) return ( {/* "Padding" at the table bottom, so the content doesn't hide below the footer when printing. */} {data.map(({ start, workHours }) => ( ))} {/* Footer not in because otherwise it get's repeated on every printed page */}
Project Date Working Hours Price
BuildTheFuture {fmt.date.format(start)} {Global.utils.formatDuration(workHours)} h {fmt.currency.format(workHours * hourlyWage)}
Sum {fmt.currency.format(sum)}
{fmt.percent.format(taxRate)} Taxes {fmt.currency.format(taxes)}
Total {fmt.currency.format(total)}
) }
{Expenses.officeChart} {Expenses.equipmentChart}

const { PieChart, ResponsiveContainer } = Global.libs.recharts;

<ResponsiveContainer height={400}>
  <PieChart width={400} height={400}>
    {Global.utils.PieDLC({
      data: Object.entries(office),
      labelKey: "0",
      dataKey: "1",
      formatter: utils.formatCurrency,
      cx: "50%",
      cy: "50%",
      innerRadius: 70,
      outerRadius: 140,
      isAnimationActive: false,
    })}
  </PieChart>
</ResponsiveContainer>

const { PieChart, ResponsiveContainer } = Global.libs.recharts;

<ResponsiveContainer height={400}>
  <PieChart width={400} height={400}>
    {Global.utils.PieDLC({
      data: Object.entries(equipment),
      labelKey: "0",
      dataKey: "1",
      formatter: utils.formatCurrency,
      cx: "50%",
      cy: "50%",
      innerRadius: 70,
      outerRadius: 140,
      isAnimationActive: false,
    })}
  </PieChart>
</ResponsiveContainer>

const { PieChart, ResponsiveContainer } = Global.libs.recharts;

<ResponsiveContainer height={400}>
  <PieChart width={400} height={400}>
    {Global.utils.PieDLC({
      data: Object.entries(everything),
      labelKey: "0",
      dataKey: "1",
      formatter: utils.formatCurrency,
      cx: "50%",
      cy: "50%",
      innerRadius: 70,
      outerRadius: 140,
      isAnimationActive: false,
    })}
  </PieChart>
</ResponsiveContainer>

({
  office,
  officeChart,
  equipment,
  equipmentChart,
  everythingChart,
  sum: lodash.sum(Object.values(everything)),
})

const hourlyWage = 75

lodash($`Working Hours`.Data)
  .map(entry => ({
    month: Global.libs.datefns.format(entry.start, 'LLL yyyy'),
    ...entry,
  }))
  .groupBy('month')
  .mapValues(entries =>
    Global.utils.roundOn(
      lodash.sumBy(entries, 'workHours') * hourlyWage,
      0.01,
    )
  )
  .value()

const {
  ResponsiveContainer,
  BarChart,
  Bar,
  LabelList,
  XAxis,
  YAxis,
  Tooltip,
} = Global.libs.recharts;

const data = Object.entries(balance)
  .map(Global.utils.labeler('month', 'income'));

<ResponsiveContainer height={300}>
  <BarChart data={data}>
    <Tooltip />
    <Bar type="monotone" dataKey="income" fill="#f4d06f">
      <LabelList dataKey="income" position="top" formatter={utils.formatCurrency} />
    </Bar>
    <XAxis dataKey="month" />
    <YAxis tickFormatter={utils.formatCurrency} width={100} />
  </BarChart>
</ResponsiveContainer>
